text: Cfut ar tameddurt n ddunit d urar kan, d zzhu, d acebbeê, d zzux garawen, asuget n wayla akked derya. Am umedya ugeffur. Im$an is âaoben ijehliyen; sinna, ad isliwen, a ten twaliv ppiwôi$en; d$a ad êevmen. Di laxeôt, aâaqeb uqsiê akked ssmaê s$uô Öebbi, akked llza. Tameddurt n ddunit d zzehwa kan ip$uôôun
